options.name: Ability Improvement
options.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1, up to a maximum of 20.

options.name: Actor
options.description: Your Charisma ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. You gain expertise in Deception and Performance.

options.name: Alert
options.description: You gain a +5 bonus to initiative and can't be Surprised.

options.name: Athlete
options.description: Your Strength or Dexterity ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump distance also increases by 50%.

options.name: Charger
options.description:
Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way. Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.

options.name: Crossbow Expert
options.description:
When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the attack rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Your Piercing Shot also inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

options.name: Defensive Duellist
options.description: When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse weapon you are proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your Dexterity to be higher than 13.

options.name: Dual Wielder
options.description:
You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if your weapons aren't Light. You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

You have a +1 bonus to Armour Class while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

options.name: Dungeon Delver
options.description:
You gain Advantage on Perception checks made to detect hidden objects and on Saving Throws made to avoid or resist traps.

You gain resistance to the damage dealt by traps.

options.name: Durable
options.description: Your Constitution ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Regain full hit points every time you take a short rest.

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description: Spells you cast ignore resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1. Damage resistance options are one of the following: Elemental Adept: Acid Elemental Adept: Cold Elemental Adept: Lightning Elemental Adept: Fire Elemental Adept: Thunder

options.name: Great Weapon Master
options.description:
When an attack with a melee weapon lands a Critical Hit or kills a creature, you can make another melee weapon attack as a Bonus that turn.

When attacking with a Two-Handed or Versatile melee weapon (in both hands) that you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

options.name: Heavily Armoured
options.description: Your Strength ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Gain Proficiency with HeavyArmour.

options.name: Heavy Armour Master
options.description: Your Strength ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

options.name: Lightly Armoured
options.description: Your Strength or Dexterity ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Gain Proficiency with LightArmour.

options.name: Lucky
options.description: You gain 3 Luck Points that recharge after a Long Rest, which you can use to gain Advantage on Attack Rolls, Ability Checks, or SavingThrows, or to make an enemy reroll their Attack Roll.

options.name: Mage Slayer
options.description:
When a creature casts a Spell within melee range of you, you have Advantage on any SavingThrows against it.

You can use a Reaction to immediately make an attack against the caster if it casts a spell within 1.5m / 5ft of you.

Enemies you hit have Disadvantage on Concentration SavingThrows.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
options.description: Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
options.description: Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Wisdom.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Druid
options.description: Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Druid spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Wisdom.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
options.description: Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Sorcerer spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
options.description: Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Warlock spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
options.description: Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Intelligence.

options.name: Martial Adept
options.description: Learn two Manoeuvres from the Battle Master archetype and receive 1 (additional) Superiority Die to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.

options.name: Medium Armour Master
options.description: When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

options.name: Mobile
options.description:
Your Movement Speed increases by m=3.

When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

options.name: Moderately Armoured
options.description: Requires LightArmour Proficiency. Your Strength or Dexterity ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Gain Proficiency with MediumArmour and Shields.

options.name: Performer
options.description: Your Charisma ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

options.name: Polearm Master
options.description:
When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Pike, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus to attack with the butt of your weapon.

You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

options.name: Resilient
options.description: You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20. Gain Proficiency in that ability's Saving Throws saving throw. The available passive features are: Resilient: Strength Resilient: Dexterity Resilient: Constitution Resilient: Intelligence Resilient: Wisdom Resilient: Charisma

options.name: Ritual Caster
options.description: You learn two Ritual Spell spells of your choice.

options.name: Savage Attacker
options.description: When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

options.name: Sentinel
options.description:
When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

When you hit a creature with an Attack of Opportunity, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

: You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

options.name: Sharpshooter
options.description:
Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.

options.name: Shield Master
options.description:
Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity saving throw when wielding a Shield.

If a Spell forces you to make a Dexterity saving throw, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage. - On a failed save, you only take half damage. - On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

options.name: Skilled
options.description: You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

options.name: Spell Sniper
options.description: You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Critical Hit while attacking with a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

options.name: Tavern Brawler
options.description: Your Strength or Constitution ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your strength modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Roll.

options.name: Tough
options.description: Hit Point maximum increased by 2 for each level.

options.name: War Caster
options.description:
You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.

options.name: Weapon Master
options.description: Your Strength or Dexterity ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Gain Proficiency with four Weapon types of your choice.
